launchctl setenv XDG_CONFIG_HOME $HOME/.config launchctl setenv XDG_CACHE_HOME $HOME/.cache launchctl setenv XDG_DATA_HOME $HOME/.local/share launchctl setenv XDG_STATE_HOME $HOME/.local/state
launchctl setenv NPM_CONFIG_USERCONFIG $XDG_CONFIG_HOME/npm/npmrc
launchctl setenv IDEA_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/intellij/idea.properties launchctl setenv CLION_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/clion/idea.properties launchctl setenv APPCODE_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/appcode/idea.properties launchctl setenv DATAGRIP_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/datagrip/idea.properties launchctl setenv STUDIO_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/android_studio/idea.properties launchctl setenv WEBIDE_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/webstorm/idea.properties launchctl setenv GOLAND_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/goland/idea.properties launchctl setenv RUSTOVER_PROPERTIES $HOME/.jetbrains/rustover/idea.properties
